job_history.work_description: Financial Reporting : Accountable for the provision of accurate, timely and efficient financial reports on behalf of management to lodge financial statements (B/S, P/L, Cash Flow and Others Specific Reports) within the Group and also to the external parties Applying AUS-IFRS Accounting standards and Company Accounting Policy across various transactions and accounting issues. Royalty Reporting: In charge of 150 plus Royalty Reports, Monthly or Quarterly reporting to Warner, Brothers, Mattel, Disney, Lego etc. global brands; Verify sales reports with Licensing Contracts, Royalty Rates, CMF/ BDI, Other Marketing Funds etc. Royalty, Payment / Withholding Tax

Cash flow/ Foreign Currency management Foreign currency Management: Options and Swap Management of the banking function including daily Banking Reconciliation for the group Accounts. Staff Expense management/ Concur -SAP staff self- report system / Company Cards Management Leadership and support of the International Logistic. AP, AR and payroll functions Oversees Accounts Payable /Accounts Receivable/Payroll functions, provide training to staff. Coordinate with International logistic department to handle any urgent shipping documents.

Ensuring that transactions comply with financial policies and procedures; Preparing, verifying, processing invoices and coding payment documents; Preparing batches of invoices for data entry and ensuring accuracy and completeness of data; Completing banking and invoicing through the MYOB and RMS operating systems; Recording all cheques and maintaining the general ledger; Maintaining accounts receivable and payable;

Taking bookingsCash/ Payment handling Actively approaching potential clients in promoting and selling various products and services; Online customer service Customer care Assist with other office/ administrative tasks.

Providing administrative support including filing, printing and organising confidential client documents; Handling credit card enquiries from corporate clients in a professional manner; Addressing general client enquiries and complaints, ensuring client satisfaction is maintained; Assessing credit applications, ensuring details are completed accurately with correct identification; Gaining knowledge in regulations and principles in commercial banking; Providing advice on credit applications and various credit products and services; Liaising with team managers and reporting on client follow-up requirements; Building rapport with clients to maintain long term relationships.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in providing accurate and timely financial reports, applying AUS-IFRS Accounting standards and Company Accounting Policy.

skills.name: Accounting Standards
skills.explanation: Has applied AUS-IFRS Accounting standards and Company Accounting Policy across various transactions and accounting issues, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Has experience in analyzing financial data, including sales reports, royalty rates, and marketing funds, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Cash Flow Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing cash flow, including foreign currency management and banking reconciliation, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in overseeing payroll functions, including providing training to staff, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Accounts Payable/Receivable
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing accounts payable and receivable, including preparing and verifying invoices, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience in leading and supporting teams, including providing training to staff, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has experience in providing customer service, including addressing client enquiries and complaints, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Microsoft Office
skills.explanation: No specific mention of Microsoft Office skills, but likely used in various roles.
